statements: SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, sensor_type FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, data_type, data_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_data_value FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, sensor_type, data_type, data_value, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, sensor_type, data_type, data_value FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 3 AND data_type IN ('Humidity', 'Pressure')
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, sensor_type, data_type, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_value > 50
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, sensor_type, MIN(data_value) AS min_value, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM sensors WHERE location_id = 2 GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY max_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT id, location, temperature, humidity FROM sensors WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM weather_patterns WHERE pattern_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT id, location FROM sensors WHERE temperature >= 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name FROM weather_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%rain%';
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY location ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT id, location, description FROM sensors JOIN weather_patterns ON sensors.id = weather_patterns.pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM Sensors;
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM Locations;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, humidity, pressure FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, Sensors.location, Locations.city, Locations.country FROM Sensors JOIN Locations ON Sensors.location = Locations.location_id;
SELECT location, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM Sensors GROUP BY location;

SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, Locations.city, SensorData.timestamp, SensorData.humidity FROM Sensors JOIN Locations ON Sensors.location = Locations.location_id JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE SensorData.humidity > 50 ORDER BY SensorData.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature Sensor';
SELECT location, sensor_type, temperature FROM Sensors ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location LIKE '%office%';
SELECT location, temperature FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity';
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM Sensors GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT city, country FROM locations;
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM weather_stations;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE temperature > 25.0
SELECT location, temperature FROM sensors WHERE humidity < 50.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM weather_stations INNER JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = weather_stations.location_id
SELECT sensor_id, type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
